amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to increase the capacity of Federal agencies to ensure effective contract management and contract oversight.

vote.text: Amendment SA 149 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 149 proposed by Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 149 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 149 proposed by Senator Shaheen.
